definition: surname Di/generic name for northern ethnic minorities during the Qin and Han Dynasties (221 BC-220 AD)
three-stroke form of Kangxi radical 94 犬[quan3]
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

Di Renjie (607-700), Tang dynasty politician, prime minister under Wu Zetian, subsequently hero of legends/master sleuth Judge Dee, aka Chinese Sherlock Holmes, in novel Three murder cases solved by Judge Dee 狄公案[Di2 gong1 an4] translated by Dutch sinologist R.H. van Gulik 高羅珮|高罗佩[Gao1 Luo2 pei4]
Oedipus, hero of tragedy by Athenian dramatist Sophocles
Three Murder Cases Solved by Judge Dee, 1949 novel by R.H. van Gulik, featuring Tang Dynasty politician Di Renjie 狄仁傑|狄仁杰[Di2 Ren2 jie2] as master sleuth
non-Han tribes in the east and north of ancient China/barbarians
Karl Berngardovich Radek (1885-1939), Bolshevik and Comintern leader, first president of Moscow Sun Yat-sen University, died in prison during Stalin's purges

pinyin: Cha2 er3 si1 · Di2 geng1 si1

sentences.english: Some people see this one, Aphrodite does not play on the air to one.
sentences.chinese: 一看到這幾個人，阿芙羅狄忒就氣不打一處來。

sentences.english: Dixie itself is a nickname for the American South.
sentences.chinese: 狄克西本身是美國南部的別稱。

sentences.english: Yet you have a few people in Sardis who have not soiled their clothes.
sentences.chinese: 然而在撒狄你還有幾名是未曾污穢自己衣服的。

sentences.english: Now read Jesus' report card to this group of believers in Sardis.
sentences.chinese: 現在請看耶穌對撒狄信徒的評語。

sentences.english: Dinin did not want to be tracked.
The ancient Greek dedicated many shrines to Aphrodite.
sentences.chinese: 阿弗羅狄特造了許多神廟。

sentences.english: Diego, come on. The ice may be thin.
sentences.chinese: 狄亞哥，得了吧，這冰也許的確很薄。

sentences.english: Yquem has unbelievable aging potential. Because it is so rich, opulent and sweet.
sentences.chinese: 狄甘甜白酒豐富，濃郁具有驚人的陳年潛力。

sentences.english: Elsewhere, DeLinda escorts her sheepishly innocent Amish cousin as he sows his oats on the Vegas strip before returning to the simple life.
sentences.chinese: 狄蓮娜因表弟到訪帶他觀摩拉斯維加斯的夜生活。

sentences.english: We can catch some authentic Dixieland Jazz in the French Quarter.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以去聽法國區裏地道的狄西蘭爵士樂。

sentences.english: But Dichter was convinced this was far more than just selling.
sentences.chinese: 但狄克特確信這遠遠不止是銷售。

definition: phonetic fei or fi/elegant/phi (Greek letter Φ, φ)
solemn/reverent/calm/burial position in an ancestral tomb (old)/old variant of 默
to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat
old place name (in modern Linyi county 臨猗縣|临猗县, Shanxi)/two-character surname Linghu
a branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people/two-character surname Murong
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
